name: Quest for an old god
description:
Art was created by https://www.instagram.com/pixekate/.

Programming and writing was created by Cypress.

This is unfortunately not finished but has 10 days and 7 random events. The text still needs to be combed through for grammar and spelling and the game itself needs balancing. We build the card/logic engine inside Unreal, but didn't get far enough to take advantage of the graphics that Unreal offered us.

How did you implement the Theme: A Game of Life and Death in your game?
Not fully, the goal is the summon your god in hopes of gaining immortality but that was a later story element that had not been explored.
